title: Moth Radio Hour Short Fundraising Segments
teaser: Short fundraising handoffs for The Moth Radio Hour.
description: :30, :45 and :60 fundraising handoffs for The Moth Radio Hour. Voiced by Jay Allison. Versions with and without music. Stations can use these to hand off to local hosts during pledge drive. They work well with any of our Moth Fundraising episodes.
contentencoded: :30, :45 and :60 fundraising handoffs for The Moth Radio Hour. Voiced by Jay Allison. Versions with and without music. Stations can use these to hand off to local hosts during pledge drive. They work well with any of our Moth Fundraising episodes.
